title: $:/plugins/skeeve/action-increment
description: An actionWidget to increment a value
author: Skeeve
readme:
! Introduction

The ''action-increment'' widget is an [[action widget|https://tiddlywiki.com/#ActionWidgets]] that retrieves a value from a text reference. It will then increase the first digit-sequence found in that text and store it.

! Content and Attributes

The ''action-increment'' widget is invisible. Any content within it is ignored.

|!Attribute |!Description |
|$reference |Just a normal [[TextReference|https://tiddlywiki.com/#TextReference]] defining where the value to be incremented, is stored |

! Examples

```
<$button>
  <$action-increment $reference="!!agent"/>
  This will increment
</$button> "{{!!agent}}".
```

<$button>
  <$action-increment $reference="!!agent"/>
  This will increment
</$button> "{{!!agent}}".
